comments:
After unzipping ecplise RC3 to my c:\program files\eclipseRC3\ to installed
ecplise I try to execute the ecplise.exe and I get the following error on a window:
 An error has occurred. See the log file

On the log file I get the following error:
!SESSION Jun 25, 2004 10:18:44.254 ---------------------------------------------
